Segment.name: N10
Segment.comment: To indicate line item quantity, description, marks and numbers, commodity code, weight, and customs value

Field.name: MarksAndNumbers
Field.comment: Marks and numbers used to identify a shipment or parts of a shipment

Field.name: CommodityCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the commodity coding system used for Commodity Code

Field.name: CommodityCode
Field.comment: Code describing a commodity or group of commodities

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: ManifestUnitCode
Field.comment: Code defining the smallest package unit for the bill of lading

Field.name: CurrencyCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard ISO) for country in whose currency the charges are specified
